DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of the study is to determine the proportion of patients with M + mutation status among patients with Non Small Cell Lung Cancer adenocarcinoma.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study on the Management of Patients With Non Small Cell Lung Cancer Adenocarcinoma
DOC.criteria: Patient with lung cancer (Non Small Cell Lung Cancer adenocarcinoma) Patient for whom a search for the mutational status of EGFR (EGFRM +, M or Mx) has been done or is being analyzed Assessment of mutational status of EGFR is not done
DOC.keyword: Non Small Cell Lung Cancer adenocarcinoma
To determine the proportion of patients with M + mutation status among patients with NSCLC adenocarcinoma
